### Book: Unmasking AI: My Mission to Protect What Is Human in a World of Machines

### Author: [Dr. Joy Buolamwini](https://www.linkedin.com/in/buolamwini/)   


Dr. Buolamwini is the founder of the [The Algorithmic Justice League](https://www.ajl.org/about) and her book exposes how AI systems encode discrimination against women, people of color, and marginalized communities. She uncovered what she calls "the coded gaze"â€”the evidence of encoded discrimination and exclusion in tech products.

Why this book? Perfect alignment with SARA's values of justice, accessibility, and making tech serve everyone - not just the privileged few.
